post:
Hello everyone!

It's been a while since our last offer, we are working on some new products and would value your honest opinion to help us make some critical decisions. **Be one of the first 100** to answer a quick 3 question survey by 11:59 PM EST tonight to get an LA OpenVZ 128 for only $0.10 your first month ($1.99/mo thereafter).

You can find the survey by [clicking here](http://goo.gl/forms/MEynxUEPnt) or by copy pasting the following URL: http://goo.gl/forms/MEynxUEPnt

You can find our LA OpenVZ 128 and other micro VPS offers by [clicking here](https://www.briehost.com/clients/cart.php?gid=13) or by copy pasting the following URL: https://www.briehost.com/clients/cart.php?gid=13


> **LA OpenVZ 128 VPS Specs:**

> Uptime - 99.99% Guaranteed

> Premium Bandwidth - 100 GB @ 1gbps

> Type - Ubuntu, Debian

> Cores - 1

> RAM - 128 MB

> Burstable to - 256 MB

> HDD - 6 GB (RAID 10)

> IPv4 - 1 included

> IPv6 - 10 included 

Thank you for your time and looking forward to hearing from you!
The Brie Host Team
